thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 19 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Seals Third Partial Sale Of M25 Infrastructure Asset

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Seals Third Partial Sale Of M25 Infrastructure Asset
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Balfour Beatty Plc:
* BALFOUR BEATTY ANNOUNCES THIRD PARTIAL SALE OF M25 INFRASTRUCTURE ASSET
* ‍SALE IS FOR A CASH CONSIDERATION OF £42 MILLION​ * ‍EXPECTED PROFIT ON DISPOSAL ON THIS TRANSACTION IS £22 MILLION​
* PROCEEDS FROM THIS TRANSACTION WILL BE USED TO PAY DOWN BORROWINGS IN 2018
* ‍GROUP CONTINUES TO OWN A 15 PERCENT STAKE IN CONNECT PLUS.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
